definitions.definition: a device for changing the sound of a musical instrument, usually making it quieter:
examples: He was playing his trumpet with a mute.

definitions.definition: a button on an electronic device that makes it silent:
examples: I pressed the mute on my phone so she couldn't hear the people talking in the background.

definitions.definition: a person who is not able to speak
If you mute a noise, you do something to make it less loud:
examples: Heavy curtains muted the noise of the traffic.

definitions.definition: If you mute a musical instrument, you attach a device to it that changes its sound, usually making it quieter:
